content.title: Fellowship For Superannuated Faculty Members
content.details: The 'Fellowship for Superannuated Faculty Members' scheme is a fellowship scheme by the University Grants Commission (UGC), Department of Higher Education to provide opportunities to superannuated faculty members of Universities/Institutes/Colleges, hereinafter 'Institutions' to pursue research in their area(s).
benefits: Tenure: 3 years or up to 70 years whichever is earlier.
Slots: 100 per annum or as may be decided by the Commission.
eligibility: Faculty members at the level of Professors/Associate professors (who are going to superannuate within six months or already superannuated) from accredited institutions.
Must have supervised the Ph.D. dissertations of 10 full-time candidates, 3 of whom have received their degrees during the preceding 10 years.
Must have handled at least 3 sponsored research projects funded by national/international agencies.
Must not hold any administrative responsibility during the tenure of the fellowship.
Must provide an undertaking in the application.
content.application_process: Online applications are invited once a year through advertisements in leading newspapers & employment news. Short notification is also uploaded on the UGC website.
documents_required: Scanned copy of passport-size photograph and signature (size up to 1MB, format: jpg).
Complete Research proposal (size up to 5 MB) and an abstract (size up to 1MB).
Auto-generated form signed by the HoD/Registrar.
Proof of being a single girl child on an affidavit of Rs. 100/- stamp paper.

faqs.question: Does Only The Submission Of An Application Form Guarantee The Award Of A Fellowship And Research Grant?
faqs.answer: No, mere submission of an application form does not guarantee the award of a Fellowship and Research Grant.

faqs.question: Who Shall Be Held Responsible If The Applicant Furnishes Incorrect/Incomplete Information That Results In The Cancellation Of His/Her Candidature?
faqs.answer: It is the responsibility of the applicant to provide correct information, failing which he/she will be solely responsible for the cancellation of his/her candidature.

faqs.question: Can I Apply Offline For The Scholarship/Fellowship?
faqs.answer: No. You need to visit the official website to apply.

faqs.question: Is There Validity To The Scheme's Benefits?
faqs.answer: The benefits are provided till the complete duration of the course.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee?
faqs.answer: No. The entire application process is completely free of cost.

faqs.question: Do I Need To Complete The Application In One Sitting?
faqs.answer: No. You can save the application as draft and continue at a later time before the deadline.

faqs.question: How Do I Know If A Field In The Application Form Is Mandatory?
faqs.answer: The mandatory fields have a red asterisk (*) mark at the end.

faqs.question: What Is The Objective Of The Scheme Of 'Fellowship For Superannuated Faculty Members'?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to provide opportunities to superannuated faculty members to pursue research in their area(s).

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Tenure Of The Candidate Selected For This Fellowship?
faqs.answer: The tenure will be 3 years or up to the age of 70 years whichever is earlier.

faqs.question: How Many Slots Are There In This Fellowship?
faqs.answer: There are 100 slots per annum or as may be decided by the Commission.

faqs.question: What Is The Amount Of Financial Assistance That Is Provided In This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Fellowship: Rs. 50,000/- per month, Contingency: Rs. 50,000/- per annum.

faqs.question: What Is The Age Criteria?
faqs.answer: The applicant should be less than or equal to 67 years in age.
